title: Pucker Up
description: Sometimes you have to kiss a few frogs...They say, "All the good ones are taken" but not in Pucker Up. The authors are teaming up to bring you stories that will leave you laughing, crying, and wanting to binge the whole anthology from start to finish. Come join on a ride where our quirky, but loveable heroines meet their swoon-worthy heroes and find their match.Come enjoy stories from:Ashley Zakrzewski - USA Today BestsellerAmy Stephens - USA Today BestsellerRuthie HenrickJosie KerrMellanie SzeretoTamsyn Bester & Robin AshKristin LeeHarper RayTracy BroemmerAndi MacDowallBarb ShulerDee EkkusR.S. JoneseeAnnee Jones
author: Ashley Zakrzewski
